title: African Village Life | Morning Routine In The Farm

tasks.task: Interacting with children during holiday activities
subtasks: Carrying and rocking a piece (likely a toddler or child)
Responding to a child's question about Santa Claus
Assisting with setting up money for a holiday activity
Expressing sadness or apologize to a child

tasks.task: Managing conflicts or misunderstandings with children
subtasks: Reprimanding a child for stealing a pencil case
Settling a disagreement between children over a pencil case
Giving verbal apologies to children and seeking forgiveness

tasks.task: Conducting a holiday-themed praise and punishment scenario
subtasks: Playing Santa Claus and evaluating children's behavior
Offering or rejecting rewards to children based on their behavior
Acting out role-play scenarios with children (e.g., Bluey's game)
Explaining reasons why children don't receive presents (e.g., behavior)
Encouraging children to engage in storytelling or better behavior
